service.description: This allows you to open various ports related to SUSE YaST DRBD including Linstor support. 3366/3367 for lnstor satellite. 3370/3376/3377 for linstor controller. 3371 for linstor-controller when using HTTPS REST-API. Port 7788 is the default port of DRBD connection. 7788 and higher are recommend to resource connections.
